name: Computer Discovery
description:
SYNOPSIS

Have you ever wondered what a stroll inside the file system of a computer might feels like?  A magnetic wind has completely messed up your house, it’s up to you to restore the system by exploring the folders. To make it, you will have your trusted friend Lamp, who will always be by your side to guide you in this adventure.

GAME STRUCTURE

The video game is a 3D first-person single player game. It features action and adventure elements and it is set in a house that represents a computer, where the folders are rooms, the objects are files and the softwares are tools. To navigate the game world the player controls a robot called Magnet-0. The NPC Lamp will guide the player through eight quests that allow them to gradually become more friendly with the computer logic.

COMMANDS

WASD: movement
Mouse: camera movement
Left Click: grab and release 
Right Click: actions on files and folders
N: new folder
P, esc: pause the game
E: NPCs interaction
